subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The first round of the Evian Championship, the fifth L.P.G.A. major of the year, was postponed after heavy morning rain soaked the course in Évian-les-Bains, France.
snippet: The first round of the Evian Championship, the fifth L.P.G.A. major of the year, was postponed after heavy morning rain soaked the course in Évian-les-Bains, France.
